main event: Observers sighted a round, white light moving in a downward glide from the East to the Southeast in Apopka, Florida.
interesting points: The object was observed for 3 minutes before it disappeared behind trees., The sighting involved two witnesses, including an 18th grade school teacher and a student., The object was identified as a low flying aircraft with a landing light., The altitude and trajectory suggested it was an aircraft coming in for a landing., Local military and FAA agencies reported no unusual sightings or radar returns during that time.
witness description: one school teacher and one student, both reportedly sincere and credible
